Taro.sowing: Plant small pieces of tuber or suckers, 5-8cm deep. Best planted at soil temperatures between 20°C and 35°C.
Taro.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Best in separate bed
Taro.harvest: Harvest in approximately 28 weeks. When the leaves begin to die down. .
Taro.name: Taro

Okra.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 20°C and 35°C.
Okra.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Peppers (Capsicum, Chili), Eggplant (Aubergine)
Okra.name: Okra

Sunflower.sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 30°C.
Sunflower.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Cucumbers, Melons, Sweetcorn, Squash
Sunflower.name: Sunflower

Parsley.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 30°C.
Parsley.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Carrots, Chives, Tomatoes, Asparagus
Parsley.harvest: Harvest in 9-19 weeks. Cut stalks from outer part of plant.
Parsley.name: Parsley

Parsnip.sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 6°C and 21°C.
Parsnip.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Swiss Chard (Silverbeet), Capsicum, Peas, Potatoes, Beans, Radishes, Garlic
Parsnip.harvest: Harvest in 17-20 weeks. Best flavour if harvested after a frost..
Parsnip.name: Parsnip

Silverbeet.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 30°C.
Silverbeet.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Beans, brassica sp. (cabbage, cauliflower, etc), tomato, allium sp. (onion, garlic, chives), lavender, parsnip
Silverbeet.name: Silverbeet

Pumpkin.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 20°C and 32°C.
Pumpkin.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Sweet Corn
Pumpkin.name: Pumpkin

Kohlrabi.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 30°C.
Kohlrabi.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile)
Kohlrabi.name: Kohlrabi

French tarragon.sowing: Plant cuttings or root division. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
French tarragon.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Aubergine (Eggplant) and Capsicum (Peppers)
French tarragon.harvest: Harvest in 30-40 days. Pick leaves when young for best flavour.
French tarragon.name: French tarragon

Broccoli.sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 7°C and 30°C.
Broccoli.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile, oregano)
Broccoli.harvest: Harvest in 10-16 weeks. Cut flowerhead off with a knife..
Broccoli.name: Broccoli

Coriander.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Coriander.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dill, Chervil, Anise, Cabbages, Carrots
Coriander.name: Coriander

Lemon Balm.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Lemon Balm.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Good to attract bees
Lemon Balm.harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Cut back tall stems to prevent flowering.
Lemon Balm.name: Lemon Balm

Burdock.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 20°C.
Burdock.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Best grown in separate bed.
Burdock.name: Burdock

Potato.sowing: Plant tuber. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 30°C.
Potato.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Peas, Beans, Brassicas, Sweetcorn, Broad Beans, Nasturtiums, Marigolds
Potato.harvest: Harvest in 15-20 weeks. Dig carefully, avoid damaging the potatoes.
Potato.name: Potato

Daikon.sowing: Easy to grow. Direct in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 20°C.
Daikon.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Chervil, cress,lettuce, leeks, spinach, strawberries, tomatoes
Daikon.harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Dig daikon carefully. They are rather brittle..
Daikon.name: Daikon

Artichokes (Globe).sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 15°C and 18°C.
Artichokes (Globe).companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Needs a lot of space. Best in separate bed
Artichokes (Globe).name: Artichokes (Globe)

Kale.sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 30°C.
Kale.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, aromatic herbs (sage, dill, camomile)
Kale.name: Kale

Luffa.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 20°C and 30°C.
Luffa.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Peas, Beans, Onions, Sweetcorn
Luffa.harvest: Harvest in 11-12 weeks. Use as a back scratcher.
Luffa.name: Luffa

Fennel.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Fennel.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Best grown away from vegetables
Fennel.name: Fennel

Beetroot.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 7°C and 25°C.
Beetroot.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Onions, Silverbeet (Swiss Chard), Lettuce, Cabbage, Dwarf Beans, Dill, Peas. Strawberries
Beetroot.name: Beetroot

Brussels sprouts.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 7°C and 30°C.
Brussels sprouts.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile)
Brussels sprouts.harvest: Harvest in 14-28 weeks. Pick sprouts when small. .
Brussels sprouts.name: Brussels sprouts

Yam/Oka.sowing: Plant tubers about 5cm (1.5") deep covered with soil. Best planted at soil temperatures between 17°C and 35°C.
Yam/Oka.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Best in separate bed
Yam/Oka.harvest: Harvest in 15-20 weeks. Leave in the ground until foliage has completely died down so tubers reach maximum size.
Yam/Oka.name: Yam/Oka

Yacon.sowing: Easy to grow. Plant sprouting root/tuber to a depth of about 4cm and mulch to cover. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Yacon.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Best in separate bed
Yacon.harvest: Harvest in approximately 25 weeks. You can collect a few at a time without digging out the whole plant..
Yacon.name: Yacon

Rutabaga.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 7°C and 25°C.
Rutabaga.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Peas, Beans, Chives
Rutabaga.name: Rutabaga

Rhubarb.sowing: Easy to grow. Plant pieces of rhizome or roots 8 - 10 cm (3 - 4 in.) deep. Best planted at soil temperatures between 5°C and 20°C.
Rhubarb.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Brassicas (Cabbage, Broccoli, Cauliflower, etc)
Rhubarb.harvest: Harvest in approximately 1 years. You will have a stronger plant if you leave it for about a year before using..
Rhubarb.name: Rhubarb

Cowpeas.sowing: Easy to grow. When soil begins to warm up. After frosts finish.. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 15°C and 35°C.
Cowpeas.name: Cowpeas

Salsify.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 30°C.
Salsify.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Beans, Brassicas, Carrots, Celeriac, Endive, Kohl-rabi, Leeks, Lettuce, Alliums, Spinach
Salsify.name: Salsify

Chinese cabbage.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow direct in the garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 20°C.
Chinese cabbage.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile, coriander), lettuce, potatoes
Chinese cabbage.harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Harvest whole head or you can take a few leaves at a time.
Chinese cabbage.name: Chinese cabbage

Endive.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 15°C and 25°C.
Endive.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): beans, brassicas, carrots, cucumbers, chervil, sage.
Endive.name: Endive

Squash.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 21°C and 35°C.
Squash.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Sweet corn
Squash.name: Squash

Watermelon.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 21°C and 35°C.
Watermelon.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Sweetcorn, Sunflowers
Watermelon.name: Watermelon

Zucchini.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 21°C and 35°C.
Zucchini.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Corn, beans, nasturtiums, parsley, Silverbeet, Tomatoes
Zucchini.harvest: Harvest in 6-9 weeks. Cut the fruit often to keep producing.
Zucchini.name: Zucchini

Celeriac.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 21°C.
Celeriac.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Beans, brassicas, carrots, leeks, lettuce, peas, sage, tomatoes, onions
Celeriac.name: Celeriac

Beans - broad beans, fava beans.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 6°C and 24°C.
Beans - broad beans, fava beans.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dill, Potatoes
Beans - broad beans, fava beans.harvest: Harvest in 12-22 weeks. Pick frequently to encourage more pods.
Beans - broad beans, fava beans.name: Beans - broad beans, fava beans

Capsicum.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 18°C and 35°C.
Capsicum.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Egg plant (Aubergine), Nasturtiums, Basil, Parsley, Amaranth
Capsicum.harvest: Harvest in 10-12 weeks. Cut fruit off with sharp knife.
Capsicum.name: Capsicum

Strawberry Plants.sowing: Easy to grow. Plant with crown (of roots) just covered.. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 20°C.
Strawberry Plants.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Better in a bed on their own to allow good sun and air circulation
Strawberry Plants.harvest: Harvest in approximately 11 weeks. Strawberries bruise easily when ripe, handle carefully. Pick with a small piece of stem attached..
Strawberry Plants.name: Strawberry Plants

Strawberries (from seeds).sowing: Start inside in pots or trays after chilling seeds.. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 20°C.
Strawberries (from seeds).companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Better in a bed on their own to allow good sun and air circulation
Strawberries (from seeds).harvest: Harvest in approximately 1 years. Seedlings need to grow for about a year before fruiting. Remove first flowers. .
Strawberries (from seeds).name: Strawberries (from seeds)

NZ Spinach.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 18°C and 35°C.
NZ Spinach.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Does better if alone.
NZ Spinach.harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Pick the tips.
NZ Spinach.name: NZ Spinach

Snow Peas.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 20°C.
Snow Peas.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Carrots, Endive, Florence fennel, Winter lettuce, Brassicas.
Snow Peas.name: Snow Peas

Chilli peppers.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 18°C and 35°C.
Chilli peppers.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Best grown in a separate bed as chillis need plenty of light and air circulation.
Chilli peppers.harvest: Harvest in 9-11 weeks. Wear gloves to pick 'hot' chilies.
Chilli peppers.name: Chilli peppers

Ginger.sowing: Plant pieces of fresh root showing signs of shoots. Best planted at soil temperatures between 20°C and 30°C.
Ginger.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Grow in separate bed
Ginger.harvest: Harvest in approximately 25 weeks. Reduce water as plant dies back to encourage rhizome growth.
Ginger.name: Ginger

Lettuce.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden, or start in seed trays and plant out in 4-6 weeks.. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 27°C.
Lettuce.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Carrots, Onions, Strawberries, Beets, Brassicas, Radish, Marigold, Borage, Chervil, Florence fennel, leeks.
Lettuce.name: Lettuce

Turnip.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 12°C and 30°C.
Turnip.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Peas, Beans, Chives, Spinach, Carrots, Chicory
Turnip.name: Turnip

Rockmelon.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 20°C and 32°C.
Rockmelon.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Sweetcorn, Sunflowers
Rockmelon.name: Rockmelon

Sweet Potato.sowing: Plant shoots or cuttings (Slips). Best planted at soil temperatures between 17°C and 35°C.
Sweet Potato.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Best in Separate bed
Sweet Potato.name: Sweet Potato

Angelica.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Angelica.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Any herbs that like damp, shady areas - mint, lemon balm
Angelica.harvest: Harvest in approximately 18 months. Angelica archangelica has slightly dull leaves, not shiny..
Angelica.name: Angelica

Rosella.sowing: Sow in garden, or start in seed trays. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 20°C and 35°C.
Rosella.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Feverfew, Coriander, Nasturtium and Hyssop
Rosella.name: Rosella

Collards.sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 30°C.
Collards.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile)
Collards.name: Collards

Spinach.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Spinach.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Broad beans (fava), cabbage, cauliflower, celery, eggplant (aubergine), onion, peas, strawberry, santolina
Spinach.name: Spinach

Peas.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 24°C.
Peas.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Potatoes
Peas.harvest: Harvest in 9-11 weeks. Pick the pods every day to increase production.
Peas.name: Peas

Amaranth.sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 18°C and 30°C.
Amaranth.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Onions, corn, peppers, egg plant, tomatoes
Amaranth.name: Amaranth

Horseradish.sowing: Easy to grow. Plant root pieces. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Horseradish.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Best kept separate
Horseradish.harvest: Harvest in 16-24 weeks. Some improvement in flavour if left till after frost..
Horseradish.name: Horseradish

Basil.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 18°C and 35°C.
Basil.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Tomato
Basil.harvest: Harvest in 10-12 weeks. Pick before flowering.
Basil.name: Basil

Corn Salad.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 20°C.
Corn Salad.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Onions
Corn Salad.name: Corn Salad

Savory - summer savory.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in Garden. Lightly cover.. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 18°C and 30°C.
Savory - summer savory.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Beans, Onions
Savory - summer savory.harvest: Harvest in 6-10 weeks. Cut before flowers form for best flavour.
Savory - summer savory.name: Savory - summer savory

Cardoon.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 13°C and 25°C.
Cardoon.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Best grown in separate bed.
Cardoon.name: Cardoon

Florence Fennel.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Florence Fennel.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Lettuce, Chicory, Cucumber, peas, sage
Florence Fennel.name: Florence Fennel

Cucumber.sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 16°C and 35°C.
Cucumber.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Nasturtiums, Beans, Celery, Lettuce, Sweet Corn, Cabbages, Sunflowers, Coriander, Fennel, Dill, Sunflowers
Cucumber.harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Cut fruit off with scissors or sharp knife.
Cucumber.name: Cucumber

Shallots.sowing: Easy to grow. Plant small bulblets, with stem just showing above ground. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 30°C.
Shallots.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Lemon Balm, Borage, Carrots, Beets, Silverbeet, Lettuce, Amaranth
Shallots.harvest: Harvest in 12-15 weeks. Keep a few for your next planting.
Shallots.name: Shallots

Borage.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Borage.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Strawberry, tomatoes, zucchini/squash. Deters pests from many plants.
Borage.harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Use leaves before flowers appear, otherwise they will be 'hairy'. .
Borage.name: Borage

Garlic.sowing: Easy to grow. Plant cloves. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 35°C.
Garlic.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Beets, Carrots, Cucumbers, Dill, Tomatoes, Parsnips
Garlic.name: Garlic

Marrow.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 20°C and 35°C.
Marrow.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Peas, Beans, Onions, Sweetcorn
Marrow.name: Marrow

Tomato.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 16°C and 35°C.
Tomato.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Asparagus, Chervil,Carrot, Celery, Chives, Parsley, Marigold, Basil
Tomato.name: Tomato

Jerusalem Artichokes.sowing: Easy to grow. Plant tubers about 5cm (1.5") deep.. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 15°C.
Jerusalem Artichokes.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Tomatoes, cucumbers
Jerusalem Artichokes.name: Jerusalem Artichokes

Onion.sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 30°C.
Onion.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Lemon Balm, Borage, Carrots, Beets, Silverbeet, Lettuce, Amaranth
Onion.harvest: Harvest in 25-34 weeks. Allow onions to dry before storing.
Onion.name: Onion

Mustard greens.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 35°C.
Mustard greens.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, aromatic herbs (sage, dill, camomile)
Mustard greens.name: Mustard greens

Eggplant.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 24°C and 32°C.
Eggplant.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Beans, capsicum, lettuce, amaranth, thyme
Eggplant.harvest: Harvest in 12-15 weeks. Cut fruit with scissors or sharp knife.
Eggplant.name: Eggplant

Tomatillo.sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 21°C and 27°C.
Tomatillo.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Will happily grow in a flower border
Tomatillo.harvest: Harvest in 10-14 weeks. Husk splits when fruit is ripe..
Tomatillo.name: Tomatillo

Chicory.sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 20°C.
Chicory.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Carrots, onions, Florence fennel, tomatoes.
Chicory.harvest: Harvest in 16-24 weeks. Will need forcing before final harvest.
Chicory.name: Chicory

Rocket.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Rocket.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Lettuce
Rocket.name: Rocket

Radish.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 30°C.
Radish.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Chervil, cress,lettuce, leeks, spinach, strawberries, tomatoes
Radish.name: Radish

Sage.sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Sage.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Broccoli, Cauliflower, Rosemary, Cabbage and Carrots
Sage.harvest: Harvest in approximately 18 months. Time reduced if grown from cuttings.
Sage.name: Sage

Beans - climbing.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 16°C and 30°C.
Beans - climbing.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Sweetcorn, spinach, lettuce, summer savory, dill, carrots, brassicas, beets, radish, strawberry, cucumbers, zucchini, tagates minuta (wild marigold)
Beans - climbing.name: Beans - climbing

Mizuna.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 30°C.
Mizuna.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Radish, lettuce
Mizuna.name: Mizuna

Asparagus Pea.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 15°C and 20°C.
Asparagus Pea.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Best grown in separate bed
Asparagus Pea.harvest: Harvest in 8-11 weeks. Pick early, pick often.
Asparagus Pea.name: Asparagus Pea

Celery.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 12°C and 21°C.
Celery.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Not applicable as celery needs to be close together to encourage blanching.
Celery.name: Celery

Pak Choy.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 21°C and 30°C.
Pak Choy.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile, coriander), lettuce, potatoes
Pak Choy.name: Pak Choy

Chives.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 30°C.
Chives.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Carrots, Tomatoes, Parsley, Apples
Chives.name: Chives

Thyme.sowing: Grow in seed trays and plant out 6-8 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 15°C and 25°C.
Thyme.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dry-environment herbs (oregano,sage), Eggplant, Cabbage
Thyme.harvest: Harvest in 42-52 weeks. Root divisions ready in 3 months.
Thyme.name: Thyme

Cauliflower.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 30°C.
Cauliflower.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile)
Cauliflower.name: Cauliflower

Asparagus.sowing: Easy to grow. Plant as crowns. Best planted at soil temperatures between 16°C and 30°C.
Asparagus.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Parsley, Basil, Nasturtiums, Lettuce
Asparagus.harvest: Harvest in 2-3 years. Plant 'crowns' to harvest earlier .
Asparagus.name: Asparagus

Cabbage.sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 5°C and 18°C.
Cabbage.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile, thyme)
Cabbage.name: Cabbage

Beans - dwarf.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 16°C and 30°C.
Beans - dwarf.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Sweetcorn, spinach, lettuce, summer savory, dill, carrots, brassicas, beets, radish, strawberry and cucumbers, tagates minuta (wild marigold)
Beans - dwarf.harvest: Harvest in 7-10 weeks. Pick often to encourage more flower production.
Beans - dwarf.name: Beans - dwarf

Spring onions.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 20°C.
Spring onions.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Lemon Balm, Borage, Carrots, Beets, Silverbeet, Lettuce, Amaranth
Spring onions.name: Spring onions

Cape Gooseberry.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Cape Gooseberry.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Will happily grow in a flower border
Cape Gooseberry.name: Cape Gooseberry

Rosemary.sowing: Easy to grow. Plant cuttings . Best planted at soil temperatures between 15°C and 20°C.
Rosemary.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Beans, Carrots, Cabbages, Sage
Rosemary.harvest: Harvest in approximately 1 years. In warmer areas, harvest time might be shorter.
Rosemary.name: Rosemary

Dill.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 20°C.
Dill.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Cabbage, Coriander, Fennel, tomatoes, broccoli
Dill.harvest: Harvest in 8-12 weeks. Use leaves before flowering.
Dill.name: Dill

Choko/Chayote.sowing: Easy to grow. Plant whole mature fruit when one produces a shoot at one end.. Best planted at soil temperatures between 15°C and 30°C.
Choko/Chayote.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Cucumbers
Choko/Chayote.harvest: Harvest in approximately 17 weeks. Best when fruit is light green and not more than 6cm long.
Choko/Chayote.name: Choko/Chayote

Carrot.sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 30°C.
Carrot.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Onions, Leeks, Lettuce, Sage, Peas, Radishes, Tomatoes, Beans, Celery, Rosemary
Carrot.name: Carrot

Oregano.sowing: Sow in garden, or start in seed trays. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 18°C and 25°C.
Oregano.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Broccoli
Oregano.harvest: Harvest in 6-8 weeks. When flowers appear.
Oregano.name: Oregano

Sweet corn.sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 16°C and 35°C.
Sweet corn.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): All beans, cucumber, melons, peas, pumpkin, squash, amaranth
Sweet corn.name: Sweet corn

Sweet Marjoram.sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 10°C and 25°C.
Sweet Marjoram.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Peppers (Capsicums, Chilis), Sage,
Sweet Marjoram.harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Best flavour if picked before flowering.
Sweet Marjoram.name: Sweet Marjoram

Savory - winter savory.sowing: Easy to grow. Start in trays. Cover seed lightly.. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 18°C and 30°C.
Savory - winter savory.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Beans
Savory - winter savory.harvest: Harvest in 6-10 weeks. Use the leaves fresh..
Savory - winter savory.name: Savory - winter savory

Mint.sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in trays and plant out or start from cuttings. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 21°C and 24°C.
Mint.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Cabbages, Tomatoes
Mint.harvest: Harvest in 8-12 weeks. Cut leaves from top with scissors.
Mint.name: Mint

Leeks.sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed. Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 30°C.
Leeks.companion: Compatible with (can grow in same bed): Carrots
Leeks.harvest: Harvest in 15-18 weeks. Loosen with a fork rather than pull by hand..
Leeks.name: Leeks
